description:
Infosys is seeking a Sr. Cloud Architect. This role will apply your technical proficiency across different stages of the Software Development Life Cycle including Requirements Elicitation, Application Architecture definition and Design.

Required Qualifications:

Candidate must be located within United States.

Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent required from an accredited institution. Will also consider three years of progressive experience in the specialty in lieu of every year of education

10 Years of IT experience required

U.S. citizens and those authorized to work in the U.S. are encouraged to apply, we are unable to sponsor at this time

Preferred Qualifications:

UI & Markup Languages->Angular JS (HTML/ CSS/ JavaScript/ Bootstrap/ jQuery/ HTML5/ CSS3/ AngularJS/ Angular 2/ Angular 4/ Angular 5/ Angular 6/ Angular7/ Angular 8/ Angular.JS)

Knowledge on Best practices for developing Spring boot micro services.

Experience in large scale Spring boot micro services-based implementations.

Knowledge on CICD process and Steps.

Experience in Using Messaging Queues like Kafka.

Experience in Code reviews and Quality gateway standards for Spring boot micro services.

Knowledge on Log monitoring tools like ELK (Elastic search, Logstash and Kibana), Cloud watch.

Knowledge of architectural design patterns, performance tuning, database and functional designs

Experience with cloud-based data solutions such as Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Microsoft Azure

Knowledge of relational Databases preferably Oracle and Postgres

Understand client’s business problems and provide Technology consulting to identify the best fit solution

Cloud fitment analysis and estimation for AWS products

Comprehend requirements and Client’s AWS maturity and define viable Solution Architecture

A strong track record of successfully architecting and deploying AWS solutions.

Ability to work both independently and in a multi-disciplinary team environment.

Ability to analyze ambiguous technical and customer situations and to determine appropriate solutions, as necessary.

Ability to create and maintain healthy working relationships with Partners, Clients, and Infosys team.

Excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly articulate customer requirements and pain points to executives and to a feature crew.

Ability to communicate effectively with various audiences ranging from developers to CIOs and other technical decision makers.

A key member of the sales pursuit team interacting with the pursuit leadership and delivery to develop a fit for purpose solution that is winnable and deliverable

Create integrated solutions for transformation that bundle the best mix of Infosys offerings, assets, and capabilities to deliver the client value proposition on complex, multi-service group opportunities

Owns the end-to-end solution; Is the key decision-maker for and drives the overall solution

Creates solutions that resonate with and align with C-suite priorities

Ability to develop value/client-centric solutions in response to client needs and market trends

A thought leader with proven track record in leading transformational projects will be a plus

Someone from Consulting / advisory background would be considered a plus

Is passionate about technology as a differentiator

Exposure to Azure/GCP would be plus.

For candidates based out of CA, WA, NY, & CO states, estimated annual compensation will be $113,000 to $147,000

About Us

Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over four decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise, and ideas from our innovation ecosystem.

To Learn more about Infosys and see our ideas in action please visit us at: www.Infosys.com

Infosys is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, spouse of protected veteran, or disability.
